title: Android KitKat reaches its end as Google Play services discontinues support
description: Google Play services support will end for KitKat starting on August 2023.

title: Does Google Fi Wireless support Wi-Fi calling?
description: Wondering if Google Fi supports Wi-Fi calling? The short answer is yes. We explain how Google Fi wifi calling works.

title: Netflix adds new ‘My Netflix’ tab for quick access to saved shows and downloads
description: The feature will arrive on iOS today and on Android in August.

title: The best cheap Android tablet gets a 26% price cut
description: The Samsung Galaxy Tab A8 is now at it's best price in months ahead of the Unpacked event.

title: The maxed-out OnePlus 10T plunges to an all-time low price
description: A 29% price drop on the top-spec OnePlus 10T slashes the asking price to just $499.99.

title: Sony WF-1000XM4 vs Sony WF-1000XM5: Are they worth the upgrade?
description: Should you upgrade to the latest model or are the WF-1000MX4 a good fit?

title: Sony WF-1000XM5 vs Samsung Galaxy Buds 2 Pro: Which earbuds are right for you?
description: One of these flagship earbuds is a universal recommendation, while the other banks on an ecosystem moat to impress.

title: Sony WF-1000XM5 are here: Price, features, specs, availability, and more
description: These flagship earbuds have excellent noise canceling and are more comfortable than before.

title: Sony WF-1000XM5 vs Apple AirPods Pro 2: Which earbuds to get?
description: Both bring their A game, but only one can be the best.

title: Samsung’s Smart View can finally mirror your screen to Chromecast devices
description: The option to enable Chromecast support is hidden within Smart View.

title: Straight Talk finally offers discounted family plans
description: After nearly 15 years of existing, Straight Talk finally has discounted family plans.

title: Spotify Connect is the reason I won’t switch to another music platform
description: A seamless cross-platform experience like no other.

title: Twitter wants you to pay to send more DMs
description: The move has been put in place citing a spam bot problem, but pushes users to pay for Twitter Blue.

title: Sony Xperia 5 V video leaks: A major change is coming for the series
description: This could be the first time in the series that an Xperia 5 model comes with a dual rear camera setup.

title: Twitter is killing the bird logo and replacing it with an ‘X’
description: The bird will not be the word anymore.

title: Spotify Premium price hike likely coming to the US this week
description: The service will reportedly get a $1 price increase.
